key_achievements: Reduced system response time by 40% through microservices optimization
Led team of 5 developers in building scalable e-commerce platform
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 60%
Mentored 3 junior developers who successfully advanced their careers

5名の開発者チームを率いてスケーラブルなECプラットフォームを構築
CI/CDパイプラインを実装し、デプロイ時間を60%短縮
3名のジュニア開発者をメンタリングし、キャリアアップを支援
